message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS 

This paper discusses active learning for text classification, which falls under the sub-category of natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of unlabeled data, which is a common technique in machine learning and falls under the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses the use of training data, which is a common technique in information retrieval (IR) and falls under the sub-category of cs.IR. The paper also discusses the use of stopping methods, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (AI) and falls under the sub-category of cs.AI. Finally, the paper discusses the use of data annotation, which is a common technique in data science (DS) and falls under the sub-category of cs.DS.
